import Posts from "./PostsList"; const BlogPost = () => { return(

From the blog

Learn how to grow your business with our expert advice.

{Posts.map((post) => (
{post.date} {post.category.title}

{post.title}

{post.description}

{post.author.name}

{post.author.role}

))}
) } export default BlogPost;
